class.name: LegendVisitor
class.documentation: Collection of parameters defining how a legend will be plotted. To plot a legend the parameter 'Legend' needs to set to 'on'.

parameter.name: legend_text_colour
parameter.documentation: Legend text colour
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter legend_text_colour sent to new Magics[Legend].

parameter.name: legend_title
parameter.documentation: plot legend title text

parameter.name: legend_title_text
parameter.documentation: Text to plot as legend title

parameter.name: legend_title_orientation
parameter.documentation: Orientation of legend title, if automatic the title will be horizontal for horizontal legend and vertical for vertical

parameter.name: legend_title_font_size
parameter.documentation: Font size used for the title: The default is the same as text_entry

parameter.name: legend_title_font_colour
parameter.documentation: Font Colour used for the title: The defaut is the same as the text_entry

parameter.name: legend_title_position
parameter.documentation: relative title position

parameter.name: legend_title_position_ratio
parameter.documentation: percentage of the legend box used for the title

parameter.name: legend_units_text
parameter.documentation: Text to plot as units

parameter.name: legend_user_minimum
parameter.documentation: Use of user tailored text for minimum

parameter.name: legend_user_minimum_text
parameter.documentation: User tailored text for minimum

parameter.name: legend_user_maximum
parameter.documentation: Use of user tailored text for maximum

parameter.name: legend_user_maximum_text
parameter.documentation: User tailored text for maximum

parameter.name: legend_display_type
parameter.documentation: type of shaded legend required

parameter.name: legend_text_format
parameter.documentation: Format of automatic text (MAGICS Format/(AUTOMATIC))

parameter.name: legend_box_mode
parameter.documentation: Whether legend box is positioned automatically or by the user

parameter.name: legend_text_font
parameter.documentation: Font name - please make sure this font is installed!

parameter.name: legend_text_font_style
parameter.documentation: Font style. Set this to an empty string in order to remove all styling.

parameter.name: legend_text_font_size
parameter.documentation: Font size, specified in cm or in % ex: 0.5cm or 10%

parameter.name: legend_text_quality
parameter.documentation: Quality of text in legend : deprecated use legend_text_font and legend_text_font_style

parameter.name: legend_text_orientation
parameter.documentation: Orientation of the text : horizontal by default

parameter.name: legend_user_lines
parameter.documentation: List of text for legend entries

parameter.name: legend_column_count
parameter.documentation: Number of columns in the legend

parameter.name: legend_entry_plot_direction
parameter.documentation: Method of filling in legend entries

parameter.name: legend_entry_plot_orientation
parameter.documentation: going from bootom to top ot top to bottom in column mode!

parameter.name: legend_text_composition
parameter.documentation: Determines whether to use automatically-generated or user-generated text (or both) in the legend

parameter.name: legend_user_text
parameter.documentation: User text to be associated with a legend sub-entry from a multiple entry

parameter.documentation: X coordinate of lower left corner of legend box (Relative to page_x_position)
